_header: Lordings that are lief and dear

BLHar2252.First Lines:
[L]ordyngis that are leff and dereLystenyth and I shall you
                    tell…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Ihesu that suffred woundes foreGraunt vs all the blysse of
                    hevyn
BLHar2252.Note:
3834 lines; slightly imperfect. Space left for enlarged ‘L’,
                    which was left blank.
